title: Jason Cammisa! (HAGERTY)
description:
Jason Cammisa is the host of the shows “Know it All”, “Icons”, and “Revelations”, which air on Hagerty’s YouTube channel. His latest video analyzes the history of the iconic BMW M3. We talk to him about what it took to film that incredible video and what he thinks about the new M3. Then, Matt and Zack talk about what they've driven lately and answer fan Q&A.

Watch his M3 film here! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u3EiY7sQWr4

 

Go be your strongest self, use J-B Weld, World's Strongest Bond. Available at JBWeld.com

author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
